title: How to Make a Lavender and Peppermint Room Spray

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a clean spray bottle and shake vigorously.
Use.
steps.description: This can be used as many times as wished but remember to shake before each use to redistribute the oils; it is refreshing and should be non-irritating around most people.

text: Pour the mixture into a clean spray bottle and shake vigorously. Screw on the spray lid. Use. This can be used as many times as wished but remember to shake before each use to redistribute the oils; it is refreshing and should be non-irritating around most people.
